="preserve">Christine Hargreaves (22 March 1939 – 12 August 1984) was an English actress. She was best known for his role as Christine Hardman in the ITV soap opera "Coronation Street" between 1960-63.
Hargreaves was born in Salford, Lancashire, and was one of the original cast members of "Coronation Street". She was died on 12 August 1984 from a brain tumor in London at the age of 45.
